summary: This module implements a vector‑quantized autoencoder (VQ‑VAE) for diffusion models. It defines a dataclass to hold encoder latent tensors and a VQModel class that combines an encoder, a vector quantizer, and a decoder, handling configuration, forward passes, and output formatting.
business_intent: Provide a compact, discrete latent representation that can be used in generative pipelines (e.g., diffusion models) to improve efficiency and quality of image or video synthesis.
